AI Description: LAMMPS (Large-scale Atomic/Molecular Massively Parallel Simulator) is a classical molecular dynamics code designed for simulating large-scale atomistic systems. It is highly versatile and can be used to model a wide range of materials and complex molecular structures.
Core Features: Support for parallel execution on a range of computing architectures
Wide selection of force fields and potential models
Extensible through user-defined functionalities and customizations
